name: ankore
description: Ankore CLI para criar cards de sentence mining para Anki

scripts.start: npm run build && node dist/cli.js start
scripts.watch: npm run build && node dist/cli.js start --watch
scripts.sample-export: npm run build && node dist/cli.js sample-export
scripts.doctor: npm run build && node dist/cli.js doctor
scripts.check: npm run build && node --check dist/cli.js && node --check dist/index.js && node --check dist/modes/mining/index.js
